summary: Comprehensive E2E testing of Cognitive Oracle Trading Platform P3 features completed successfully. All P3 components (Wallet, Price Alerts, Advanced Orders, News Feed, Auto Trading) are fully functional. Backend APIs 100% passing (18/18 tests). Frontend features working excellently with proper navigation, modals, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: Backend: All 18 API tests passed (100%)
Backend: /api/market/prices returns all crypto and stock symbols
Backend: /api/market/{symbol}/history returns OHLCV data
Backend: /api/agents/consensus multi-agent system working
Backend: /api/oracle/query returns historical analysis
Backend: /api/voice/parse correctly parses BUY/SELL commands
Backend: /api/trades/execute and /api/trades/history working
Backend: /api/user/mood and /api/gestures/detected working
Backend: /api/portfolio/summary returns portfolio data
Navigation: All 9 tabs accessible (Trading, Orders, Alerts, Auto, News, Social, Portfolio, Wallet, Paper)
Wallet Tab: Total balance displayed ($309,244.21)
Wallet Tab: Holdings section showing BTC, ETH, SOL, USDT
Wallet Tab: Send modal opens with asset selection and amount input
Wallet Tab: Receive modal opens with QR code and wallet address
Wallet Tab: Recent Transactions section visible
Price Alerts Tab: Add Alert button and modal working
Price Alerts Tab: Symbol selection (BTC, ETH, SOL, AAPL, NVDA, SPY)
Price Alerts Tab: Condition selection (Above/Below) working
Price Alerts Tab: Alert created successfully (BTC ABOVE $95,000)
Price Alerts Tab: Sound toggle button present
Advanced Orders Tab: All 4 order types present (Limit, Stop-Loss, Take-Profit, Trailing-Stop)
Advanced Orders Tab: BUY/SELL buttons working
Advanced Orders Tab: Symbol selection working
Advanced Orders Tab: Order confirmation modal working
News Feed Tab: Live News Feed header and Refresh button
News Feed Tab: All 4 filter buttons (All News, Bullish, Bearish, High Impact)
News Feed Tab: Market Sentiment section showing 75% Bullish / 25% Bearish
Auto Trading Tab: PAPER mode badge displayed
Auto Trading Tab: Stats cards (Trades, P&L, Wins, Losses)
Auto Trading Tab: All 4 strategies with toggle buttons (Momentum, Mean Reversion, Breakout, DCA)
Auto Trading Tab: Start/Stop button working
Control Panel: All 5 buttons aligned and functional (Voice, Gesture, Mood, Oracle, Message)
Control Panel: Toggle expand/collapse working
Control Panel: Status indicators (VOICE, MOOD, RISK) updating correctly
Mobile: Hamburger menu button present
Mobile: All 9 nav tabs visible in 3x3 grid layout
Mobile: Control panel visible at bottom
test_credentials: No credentials needed - uses mock data
seed_data_creation: Price alert created for BTC ABOVE $95,000 during testing

mocked_features.note: Several features use MOCKED/simulated data as designed
mocked_list: Wallet transactions - simulated in frontend state
News feed - static mock news articles
Auto trading strategies - mock strategy data with simulated trades
Agent consensus - uses GPT-5.2 with fallback simulation

context_for_next_testing_agent: All P3 features (Wallet, Alerts, Orders, News, Auto Trading) are fully implemented and tested. Backend uses CoinGecko for real crypto prices. Stock prices are simulated. WebSocket has REST fallback. TensorFlow.js facial recognition requires webcam permission. All navigation tabs working. Control panel buttons properly aligned. Mobile responsive with hamburger menu.
